summary: An email from a law enforcement task force member reporting the acquisition of Ghislaine Maxwell's Instagram account information, noting the account was confirmed with her phone number but showed no recent activity, with the registration IP address traced to Vermont in August 2019.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Her Instagram account information was obtained by law enforcement; the account was confirmed via her phone number but showed no activity in the past six months.

events.title: Maxwell Instagram account registration
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell's Instagram account was registered with an IP address that resolved to Vermont.

events.title: Law enforcement obtains Maxwell's Instagram information
events.description: A member of the Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force emails colleagues about obtaining Ghislaine Maxwell's Instagram account details.

keyFacts: Law enforcement obtained Ghislaine Maxwell's Instagram account information, confirmed via her phone number.
The Instagram account showed no activity in the six months prior to July 2020.
The account's registration IP address resolved to Vermont in August 2019.
The communication originated from a Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force office.
